name: untucked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a piece of clothing or material is untucked, the loose end of it has not been pushed into a particular position to keep it in place and make it look tidy: He looked like a typical teenager with his baggy trousers and untucked shirt. She was wearing a brown sweater over an untucked white blouse. Related words
tuck
untuck
More examplesFewer examplesI passed a young man in an untucked shirt and blue jeans.During the course of the evening his shirt became untucked and wrinkled.Every time I tucked in one fold, another became untucked.
